Does not work. No cd error, no crack.

Alright I got it working. Because all the morons before me including the f*g who uploaded this didn't want to explain, I will now:

1. Install game
2. Open Daemon Tools or PowerISO and create a new mounting file. Use the extracted folder with all the language folders and the setup.exe
3. Mount this file
4. Play game
5. Any questions
6. Profit
